com.y0ga.Networking

Class WebClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.y0ga.Networking.WebClient

  • public class WebClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The client object that can perform http requests.

    • Method Detail

      • setDownloadBandwidthLimit

        public void setDownloadBandwidthLimit(BandwidthLimitation downloadLimit)
                               throws IllegalBandwidthException
        Defines the maximum bytes per second limit for download operations. Default is unlimited.
        Throws:
        IllegalBandwidthException

      • setUploadBandwidthLimit

        public void setUploadBandwidthLimit(BandwidthLimitation uploadLimit)
                             throws IllegalBandwidthException
        Defines the maximum bytes per second limit for upload operations. Default is unlimited.
        Throws:
        IllegalBandwidthException

      • setBufferSize

        public void setBufferSize(int bufferSize)
                   throws InvalidBufferSizeException
        Defines the size in bytes of the buffer that is used to copy streams in both upload/download operations. Default size is 4096b bytes .
        Throws:
        InvalidBufferSizeException - If the bufferSize parameter is not a power of 2.

      • setUserAgent

        public void setUserAgent(java.lang.String userAgent)
        Sets the "User-Agent" header value in every request.

      • setEncoding

        public void setEncoding(java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Sets the encoding used to encode and decode strings.

      • setLimitationMode

        public void setLimitationMode(LimitationMode mode)
        Sets the bandwidth limitation mode.

      • Headers

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> Headers()
        Returns:
        A HashMap containing the "additional" headers that will be sent for every request.

      • isBusy

        public boolean isBusy()
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates if the current WebClient instance is working on any kind of task.

      • downloadData

        public byte[] downloadData(java.net.URL url)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a GET request to the specified URL.
        Returns:
        The read bytes from the response content.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • downloadFile

        public void downloadFile(java.net.URL url,
                         java.io.File localFile)
                  throws FileNotEradicableException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Sends a GET request to the specified URL and saves the response bytes to a file.
        Throws:
        FileNotEradicableException - If the file already exists and can not be deleted.
        java.io.IOException

        Sends a GET request to the specified URL.
        Returns:
        Future<byte[]> that will contain the response bytes when read.

      • downloadStringAsync

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.String> downloadStringAsync(java.net.URL url)
        Sends a GET request to the specified URL.
        Returns:
        Future<String> that will contain the response string when read and decoded with the specified encoding.

        Sends a GET request to the specified URL.
        Returns:
        Future<Boolean> that indicates if no error were encountered.

        Returns:
        The response bytes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                                     java.lang.String string)

        Returns:
        The response string decoded with the specified encoding.
